short_summary: The Department of Transport has a requirement to access web-based, real-time access to Canadian vehicle registration and ownership data to support its claim review process for both the Incentive for Zero Emission Vehicles (iZEV) and Incentive for Medium and Heavy-duty Zero Emission Vehicles (iMHZEV) programs.

full_summary:
### Notice of Advance Contract Award Announcement

#### Tender Title english \t français
**Vehicle Eligibility Validation Services for Zero Emission Vehicle Programs**\t Services de Validation d’Admissibilité des Véhicules pour les Programmes de Véhicules à Zéro Émission.

#### Contract Reference \t Numéro de Contrat
PW-22-01006533 \t T8080-220165.

#### Notice Details english \t français
This advance contract award notice confirms that a contract for vehicle eligibility validation services has been awarded to the proponent. The services are intended to support the claim review process for both the Incentives for Zero Emission Vehicles (iZEV) and Incentives for Medium and Heavy Duty Zero Emission Vehicles (iMHZEV) programs.

#### Authorized Federal Spending enzyme \t Frais Fédéraux Autorisés
Transport Canada \t Transports Canada.

#### Services Requirements english \t français
The Department of Transport requires access to web-based, real-time data on Canadian vehicle registration and ownership with the aim of supporting its claim review process for both programs.

#### Program Requirements english \t français
The successful proponent must be able to:

* Access and validate vehicle information from a data source.
* Provide an output or report.
* Integrate with other systems systems.
